https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ukZfjeAVozgtmHmaQjd6qzzwWKJ.jpg Addison travels with a picky billionaire as an assistant in her brother's place so he doesn't lose his job. She clashes with the billionaire until both start to see more in each other than they thought. Beauty and the Billionaire
